Amplified Hearing.name: 聴覚強化
Amplified Hearing.description: Provides +2 to perception checks that use hearing.

Anti-Dazzle.name: 対閃光
Anti-Dazzle.description: Must be paired. Provides immunity to dazzling effects (like flashbangs).

Artificial Shoulder Mount.name: 追加肩マウント
Artificial Shoulder Mount.description: Allows you to install an extra pair of cyberarms.

Audio Recorder.name: オーディオ・レコーダー
Audio Recorder.description: Records sound. Can link into a chip or agent.

AudioVox.name: オーディオ・ヴォックス
AudioVox.description: Autotune synthesizer. Provides +2 to Acting and Play Instrument checks.

Big Knucks.name: ビッグ・ナック
Big Knucks.description: Armored knuckles which function as a Melee Weapon.

Biomonitor.name: バイオモニタ
Biomonitor.description: Provides an LED showing vitals readouts. Can be linked to your agent.

Braindance Recorder.name: ブレインダンス・レコーダー
Braindance Recorder.description: Records memories for BD replay. Great for Medias.

Chemical Analyzer.name: 化学物質分析器
Chemical Analyzer.description: Chipware. Test chemical make up of something.

Chemskin.name: ケムスキン
Chemskin.description: +2 Personal Grooming when using Techhair as well. Changes hue.

Chipware Socket.name: チップウェア・ソケット
Chipware Socket.description: Single socket for installation and removal of a piece of chipware.

Chyron.name: カイロン
Chyron.description: Tiny screen in your eye. Provides picture-in-picture for those boring moments.

Color Shift.name: 光彩変色
Color Shift.description: Allows you to shift eyes to an unlimited number of colors and patterns.

Cyberarm.name: サイバーアーム
Cyberarm.description: A cybernetical replacement arm. Comes with a free hand.

Cyberaudio Suite.name: サイバー聴覚基本システム

Cyberleg.name: サイバーレッグ
Cyberleg.description: A cybernetical replacement leg. Comes with a free foot.

Cybersnake.name: サイバースネーク
Cybersnake.description: A throat snake which is a Very Heavy Melee weapon.

Dartgun.name: ダーツガン
Dartgun.description: A single shot weapon which can be concealed.

Difficult Skill Chip.name: スキルチップ(×2)
Difficult Skill Chip.description: Chipware. Provides a value of 3 to a specific (x2) skill while installed (unless the skill is already 3+).

Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace.name: 強化移植筋肉&骨膜編織
Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace.description: Increase Body by 2 (and related stats). Stacks. Max at 10 Body.

Grapple Hand.name: グラップル・ハンド
Grapple Hand.description: A retractable grappling hook embedded into your hand.

Grip Foot.name: グリップ・フット
Grip Foot.description: Provides traction for climbing vertically. Must be paired.

Hardened Shielding (Cyber Arm).name: ハードンド・シールディング(サイバーアーム)
Hardened Shielding (Cyber Arm).description: The arm and installed options are not affected by EMP effects.

Hardened Shielding (Cyber Leg).name: ハードンド・シールディング(サイバーレッグ)
Hardened Shielding (Cyber Leg).description: The leg and installed options are not affected by EMP effects.

Homing Tracer.name: 追跡装置
Homing Tracer.description: Audio tracking of a tracer up to 1 mile. Replacements not included.

Image Enhance.name: 画像強調
Image Enhance.description: Must be paired. +2 Perception and Lip Reading and Conceal/Reveal Object when using sight.

Implanted Linear Frame β (Beta).name: 埋込型リニア・フレームβ(ベータ)
Implanted Linear Frame β (Beta).description: Increases your BODY stat to 14 (adjusting your HP and Wound Threshold and Death Save)

Implanted Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).name: 埋込型リニア・フレームΣ(シグマ)
Implanted Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).description: Increases your BODY stat to 12 (adjusting your HP and Wound Threshold and Death Save)

Interface Plugs.name: インターフェイス・プラグ
Interface Plugs.description: Plugs in the wrist or head to allow you to connect to machines/systems hands-free.

Internal Agent.name: 内蔵エージェント
Internal Agent.description: Built in agent. Audio only but can be linked with other cybergear.

Jump Booster.name: ジャンプ・ブースター
Jump Booster.description: Built-in hydraulics negates penalty for jumping. Must be paired.

Level Damper.name: レベル・ダンプナー
Level Damper.description: Provides immunity to deafness or sudden loud noises.

Light Tattoo.name: ライト・タトゥー
Light Tattoo.description: Glowing tattoos. +2 to Wardrobe & Style if you have at least three installed.

Low Light/IR/UV.name: 低光量/赤外線/紫外線
Low Light/IR/UV.description: Must be paired. Ignore any vision penalties due to lighting or fog/smoke.

Meat Arm.name: 生身の腕
Meat Arm.description: A regular arm. This can support attachments like a Standard Hand or some weapons and tools as the only installed piece.

Meat Leg.name: 生身の脚
Meat Leg.description: A regular leg. This can support attachments like a Standard Foot or weapons such as the Talon Foot.

Medical Grade Cyberarm.name: 医療用サイバーアーム
Medical Grade Cyberarm.description: A medical grade cyberarm. Does not allow options to be installed.

Medical Grade Cyberleg.name: 医療用サイバーレッグ
Medical Grade Cyberleg.description: A medical grade cyberleg. Does not allow options to be installed.

Medscanner.name: メドスキャナー
Medscanner.description: Built-in medscanner which allows for quick assessment of injuries. Provides +2 to First Aid and Paramedic skill checks.

Memory Chip.name: メモリ・チップ
Memory Chip.description: Chipware. Data Storage. Like a flash drive for your brain. Eject safely.

MicroVideo.name: マイクロ・ビデオ
MicroVideo.description: An eye camera which can link into a chip or agent. Great for Medias.

Midnight Lady Sexual Implant.name: ミッドナイト・レディ™性的インプラント

Mr. Studd Sexual Implant.name: Mr. スタッド™性的インプラント

MultiOptic Mount.name: 多眼マウント
MultiOptic Mount.description: Allows you to install up to 5 more cybereyes. Cybereyes sold separately.

Nasal Filters.name: 鼻孔フィルター
Nasal Filters.description: Provides immunity to inhalable gases or fumes.

Plastic Covering (Cyber Arm).name: プラスチック・カヴァーリング(サイバーアーム)
Plastic Covering (Cyber Arm).description: A type of plastic coating for your arm.

Plastic Covering (Cyber Leg).name: プラスチック・カヴァーリング(サイバーレッグ)
Plastic Covering (Cyber Leg).description: A type of plastic coating for your leg.

Popup Grenade Launcher.name: ポップアップ・グレネード・ランチャー
Popup Grenade Launcher.description: A concealable one-shot Grenade Launcher. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.
Popup Grenade Launcher.dvTable: DV グレネードランチャー

Popup Melee Weapon.name: ポップアップ近接武器
Popup Melee Weapon.description: A concealable Melee Weapon. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.

Popup Ranged Weapon.name: ポップアップ遠隔武器
Popup Ranged Weapon.description: A concealable one-handed Ranged Weapon. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.

Popup Shield.name: ポップアップ・シールド
Popup Shield.description: A foldable bulletproof shield that can be drawn or stowed easily. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.

Quick Change Mount.name: クイック・チェンジ・マウント
Quick Change Mount.description: Your cyberarm can be detached and re-attached (and swapped) using your open socket. Keep an arm for every occasion.

Radar Detector.name: レーダー探知機
Radar Detector.description: Notifies of detected active radar within a 1 mile radius.

Radar/Sonar Implant.name: レーダー/ソナー・インプラント
Radar/Sonar Implant.description: Scans 50m/yds around you. Doesn't work through cover.

Radiation Detector.name: 放射線感知器
Radiation Detector.description: Shows radiation with a blue glow. Maximum range 100m/yds.

Radio Scanner/Music Player.name: 通信スキャナー/音楽プレーヤー
Radio Scanner/Music Player.description: Tune into CitiNet radio stations or play your locally saved music.

Realskinn Covering (Cyber Arm).name: リアルスキン™・カヴァーリング(サイバーアーム)
Realskinn Covering (Cyber Arm).description: An artifical skin type for your arm.

Realskinn Covering (Cyber Leg).name: リアルスキン™・カヴァーリング(サイバーレッグ)
Realskinn Covering (Cyber Leg).description: An artifical skin type for your leg.

Rippers.name: リパー
Rippers.description: Very sharp fingernails which are a Medium Melee Weapon. Can be concealed.

Scrambler/Descrambler.name: スクランブラー/ディスクランブラー

Scratchers.name: スクラッチャー
Scratchers.description: Sharp fingernails which are a Light Melee Weapon. Can be concealed.

Sensor Array.name: センサー・アレイ
Sensor Array.description: Allows you to install up to 5 more cyberaudio options.

Shift Tacts.name: シフトタクト
Shift Tacts.description: Change eye color. Can be activated/deactivated at will.

Shoulder Cam.name: ショルダー・カム
Shoulder Cam.description: A stowable camera that pops out of your shoulder. Can link with an agent or memory chip.

Skate Foot.name: スケート・フット
Skate Foot.description: While running your movement is increased by 6m/yds. Must be paired.

Skill Chip.name: 技能チップ
Skill Chip.description: Chipware. Provides a value of 3 to a specific skill while installed (unless the skill is already 3+).

Skin Weave.name: 皮膚編繊
Skin Weave.description:
External Body Cyberware*. Head and Body Armor SP7 and recovers 1SP/day. Armor does not stack.

* Cyberware Armor does not function as armor in the system, please add the "Skin Weave" item to the character/mook to track

Slice 'N Dice.name: スライスン・ダイス
Slice 'N Dice.description: Monofilament wiring which is a Medium Melee Weapon. Can be concealed.

Standard Foot.name: スタンダート・フット
Standard Foot.description: Looks like a normal foot for the most part.

Standard Hand.name: スタンダード・ハンド
Standard Hand.description: Looks like a normal hand for the most part.

Subdermal Armor.name: 皮下アーマー
Subdermal Armor.description:
External Body Cyberware*. Head and Body Armor SP11 and recovers 1SP/day. Armor does not stack.

* Cyberware Armor does not function as armor in the system, please add the "Subdermal Armor" item to the character/mook to track

Subdermal Grip.name: 皮下グリップ
Subdermal Grip.description: Plating on your hand which allows you to utilise Smartguns. Requires a neural link.

Superchrome® Covering (Cyber Arm).name: スーパークローム®・カヴァーリング(サイバーアーム)
Superchrome® Covering (Cyber Arm).description:
サイバー四肢を光沢ある金属でコーティングする。*

*Note: スーパークローム®・カヴァーリングの効果は累積しません。 効果タブで管理する必要があります。

Superchrome® Covering (Cyber Leg).name: スーパークローム®・カヴァーリング(サイバーレッグ)
Superchrome® Covering (Cyber Leg).description:
サイバー四肢を光沢ある金属でコーティングする。*

*Note: スーパークローム®・カヴァーリングの効果は累積しません。 効果タブで管理する必要があります。

Tactile Boost.name: 触覚増強
Tactile Boost.description: Chipware. Can detect motion up to 20m/yd away through surfaces.

Talon Foot.name: タロン・フット
Talon Foot.description: A retractable blade in your foot which is a Light Melee Weapon.

Targeting Scope.name: ターゲティング・スコープ

Techhair.name: テックヘア
Techhair.description: +2 Grooming with Chemskin. Color changing hair.

Techscanner.name: テクスキャナ
Techscanner.description: Contains a variety of built-in gadgets and tools. Provides a +2 bonus to multiple skill checks.

TeleOptics.name: 望遠
TeleOptics.description: Telescope in your eye up to 800m/yds. +1 to single shot/aimed shot if greater than 50m away.

Tool Hand.name: ツール・ハンド
Tool Hand.description: Each finger in your hand has a different tool. Great for Techs!

Vampyres.name: ヴァンパイア
Vampyres.description: Pointy Teeth which is a Light Melee weapon. Can use poison/toxins.

Voice Stress Analyzer.name: ボイス・ストレス・アナライザ
Voice Stress Analyzer.description: Provides +2 to Human Perception and Interrogation checks. Can activate a special lie-detecting mode.

Web Foot.name: ウェブ・フット
Web Foot.description: Webbing between your toes allows you to swim. Must be paired.

Wolvers.name: ウルヴァー
Wolvers.description: Claws which retract from your knuckles which is a Heavy Melee Weapon. Can be concealed.
